title: Nasdaq 100, S&P 500 Slump Exceeds 1% as Tech-Stock Rout Deepens
description: US stocks continued to slide on Thursday as technology shares fell and private jobs data revived worries of an economic slowdown.
content: US stocks continued to slide on Thursday as technology shares fell and private jobs data revived worries of an economic slowdown.
